issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: hi frns i want to pick a music file from android music library in titanium and convert this music file in base64 encoded string to upload it on the server.can any one guide me how i would achieve it.
fields.summary: unable to pick music from library and convert this in base64 in titanium android.

comments.body: Hello, You can take a look around this post on [Appcelerator titanium base64 encode blob objects|http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6493055/appcelerator-titanium-base64-encode-blob-objects]. First returns the selected image as a blob object and then convert it to a string representation. Hope this helps. Thanks.
